bibl.title: Archaic Kouroi in Naucratis: The Case for Cypriot Origin. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The so-called alabaster kouroi and the limestone statuettes found in the 19th-century excavations at the site of Naucratis are products of Cypriot workshops (late seventh to the mid sixth century B.C.).
bibl.seg: JENKINS Ian, Archaic Kouroi in Naucratis: The Case for Cypriot Origin. Avec résumé en anglais.

The so-called alabaster kouroi and the limestone statuettes found in the 19th-century excavations at the site of Naucratis are products of Cypriot workshops (late seventh to the mid sixth century B.C.).
